marketing: People to find money and support for a high-quality hovercraft to be built this fall.
design: People who want to design a hovercraft/float for the Homecoming parade.
People who want to build a hovercraft/t-shirt launcher for sports events.

project_leaders.name: Zach Fox
project_leaders.bio: Zach is a junior in Aerospace Engineering and plans to work in the private space industry after graduating. He likes training for competitions with the men's rowing team.
